channel.title: Comments on: The Curious Case of Policy EC661. The Greens and their Rightwards Shift from 2015 to 2017.
channel.description: Exegesis Hermeneutics Flux Capacitor of Truthiness

item.title: By: Labour’s right wing draws up new plan to undermine Jeremy Corbyn. In Denial On the Paradigm Shift! – RogersLongHairBlog
item.dc:creator: Labour’s right wing draws up new plan to undermine Jeremy Corbyn. In Denial On the Paradigm Shift! – RogersLongHairBlog
item.description: […] What are we to do with the Wilful ignorance of the political, Media and Economics (So called), Elites. The Poll Snack Quiz for the MP survey I made about 4 days ago and it has been taken 25,000 times, Some people are obviously interested. The quizzes are embeddable I made them for David Malone’s Web Site. He is trying to get Monetary reform back into the Green Party Manifesto 2015´s policy EC661 was dropped in the 2017 manifesto.( http://letthemconfectsweeterlies.blogspot.com/2017/06/the-curious-case-of-policy-ec661-greens.html) […]
item.content:encoded: […] What are we to do with the Wilful ignorance of the political, Media and Economics (So called), Elites. The Poll Snack Quiz for the MP survey I made about 4 days ago and it has been taken 25,000 times, Some people are obviously interested. The quizzes are embeddable I made them for David Malone’s Web Site. He is trying to get Monetary reform back into the Green Party Manifesto 2015´s policy EC661 was dropped in the 2017 manifesto.( http://letthemconfectsweeterlies.blogspot.com/2017/06/the-curious-case-of-policy-ec661-greens.html) […]
